alert.note: Alert for Grafton; Merrimack; Sullivan (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 16 at 7:02PM EDT until May 16 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SULLIVAN...SOUTHWESTERN GRAFTON AND NORTHWESTERN MERRIMACK COUNTIES... At 702 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Enfield, or near Lebanon, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lebanon, New London, Grafton, Hanover, Enfield, Canaan, Danbury, Grantham, Andover, Cornish, Croydon, Dorchester, Wilmot, Orange, Springfield, Sunapee, Plainfield and Sulton. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 31 and 60. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
